name: memoizerific
description: Fastest, smallest, most-efficient JavaScript memoization lib to memoize JS functions
author: @thinkloop

scripts.build: npm run build:browserify && npm run build:minify && npm run build:gzip
scripts.build:browserify: browserify src/memoizerific.js --detectGlobals false --standalone memoizerific | derequire > memoizerific.js
scripts.build:stream: browserify src/memoizerific.js --standalone memoizerific | derequire | tee dist/memoizerific.js | uglifyjs --compress drop_console,unused=false --mangle --screw-ie8 | tee dist/memoizerific.min.js | gzip --best -v -c > dist/memoizerific.min.gzip.js
scripts.test: npm run test:map && npm run test:similar
